questions.question: What is the primary descriptor of the product's format, as explicitly stated on the packaging?
What is the principal function or health benefit prominently displayed on the product's label?
What color is the dominant textual element announcing the product's name?
What is the overall shape of the product's container, as presented in the image?
What material is the primary container made from, based on its visual appearance?
What is the most prominent brand name or logo featured on the packaging?
What is the predominant color of the brand logo displayed on the container?
What design element is used repeatedly to indicate key product features, as seen on the label?
What color is the background of the primary label section, where the product name is prominently displayed?
What is the texture of the outer packaging, as suggested by its appearance?
What is the overall color scheme of the product's packaging, ignoring the text and logo?
What is the orientation of the primary textual label on the product's container?
What is the style of the typography used to label the product's name?
What is the most prominent graphic design element apart from the logo and text?
What type of dietary restriction is explicitly mentioned as fulfilled by the product?
